justification: The article states: "The threshold (or amount of evidence required for a response to be made), b;" linking the construct of decision caution (evidence required) to the threshold parameter b of the Linear Ballistic Accumulator model.
construct: decision caution / amount of evidence required for a response

justification: The same parameter description notes "the drift rate or average speed of accumulation; v," showing that the drift-rate parameter v operationalises the construct of processing speed/evidence accumulation.
